PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01412021-03-11,  ,  IRCC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of ANGUS GAVIN GRANT of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), effective April 9, 2021.
